   contain the root `toctree` directive.

PyQtLineEditProgressBar User Manual
===================================

The PyQtLineEditProgressBar subclasses the QLineEdit widget to provide a progressbar
that is displayed in the background of the QLineEdit widget.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents
   
   intro
   api
